title: Timestream Branching and Narrative Consequences
description: Integrate warp anchor use with the Timestream Framework. Using a warp anchor creates a timeline branch, tracked in the Timestream. Overuse/misuse causes instability, visual effects, NPC/faction reactions, or cosmic threat warnings. Visualize timeline branches and anchor history in the UI.

title: Anchor Management UI/UX and Accessibility
description: Polish anchor management panel with puzzle integration, overlays, tutorials, and feedback. Add accessibility settings for all anchor effects (visual/audio, colorblind, photosensitivity). Support controller/gamepad navigation.

title: Modding Hooks for Warp Zones and Puzzles
description: Expose APIs for custom warp zone types, effects, and Universal Language puzzles. Support community-created anchor sharing, UI themes, and lore extensions.

title: Task System Documentation
description: This file documents the .task format and indexing conventions for the ProtoFusionGirl project.

title: Universal Magic Puzzle Integration for Warp Anchors
description: Require solving a Universal Language puzzle to create or restore a warp anchor. Add puzzle modal/UI and block anchor actions until solved.

title: Anchor Sharing and Quantum Bookmarks
description: Enable exporting/importing warp anchors as quantum bookmarks (datablobs). Build UI for anchor trading, discovery, and multiplayer sync. Prepare serialization and validation for multiplayer and PvP/Co-op anchor interactions.
